name: Stress Time
description:
First of all, the meaning of the gameplay is in the variety, customization and freedom of choice of the player and his character, therefore in this game there are no special attachments to any things or gameplay chips that could ruin or monotonize your passage.

 ∆Fight various creatures, customize your character, discover new abilities, develop and get rich:
- Numerous creatures with an individual fighting style, weaknesses and appearance
- A large assortment of armor, weapons and accessories, thanks to which you not only transform your character, but also become noticeably stronger
- Various abilities thanks to which you will find or create your own special battle style
- Free and spacious RPG clicker, in which only you will decide what
turn your gameplay and atmosphere of the game

Experiment, get stronger, transform yourself and have fun!
